articles.description: The defeat is a humiliation for Vladimir Putin after he announced the forced annexation of four Ukrainian regions; Russian forces blindfolded and detained the head of Europe’s largest nuclear plant; Indonesia stadium tragedy claims 129 lives. See how the day …
